mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gm_shop (user_id, shop_image, shop_name, shop_address, shop_description, shop_score, shop_deposit, shop_account, shop_status, gmt_create, gmt_modified) VALUES (#{userId}, #{shopImage}, #{shopName}, #{shopAddress}, #{shopDescription}, #{shopScore}, #{shopDeposit}, #{shopAccount}, #{shopStatus}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gm_shop WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT id FROM gm_shop WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT c1.category1_name, c2.category2_name, b1.brand_name FROM gm_category1 c1, gm_category2 c2, gm_brand b1 WHERE c1.id = #{category1Id} AND c2.id = #{category2Id} AND b1.id = #{brandId}
SELECT shop_name FROM gm_shop WHERE id = #{id}
